item.title: Server.java Server Ip's?
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Than that would be client sided, not server sided. In the client folder look in either client class, Gui class, or EGUI class (Maybe Loader class) for things like

server =
serverIP =

Until you find where to put the IP address.

item.title: Server.java Server Ip's?
item.dc:creator: @droidmobile droidmobile@yahoo.com
item.description:
@droidmobile wrote:

In my server source file Server.java I am trying to add my server Ip because when you open the client and try to sign-in, the “Server IP” option isnt there…

I want the server ip built into the client so users do not have to worry about putting the ip in

Read full topic

item.title: Server.java Server Ip's?
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

You don’t add the IP to the server, its client sided. Unless its a Delta, than you have to edit the GetWorld method in Client class.

Read full topic
